subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Guard Chris Smith, the brother of J. R. Smith of the Denver Nuggets, did not enroll at Seton Hall and will not play for the team this fall. Smith’s enrollment was pending a decision by the N.C.A.A. Clearinghouse, the university said. Once cleared, Smith, who averaged 18.8 points at St. Benedict’s Prep in Newark, could play in January.
